title: Vaada Bin Laada Lyrics Mankatha Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Krish, Suchitra
Song: Vaada Bin Laada
Lyrics : Vaali
Music Director : Yuvan Shankar Raja

Vaada Bin Laada , Oliyaadhe acchoda
Ennai twin tower endru idida
japan-in hykoova, Russia-vin vodhkaava
Nee ennul enna kandupidida

Noolaadai nikaatha idupu oh o oh
Nee vandhu soraakum aduppu oh o oh
Enna thodamale summa soodethura
naana naana vandhu modhuren .....(Vaada Bin Laada ..)

Pathu kadaivadhu thayiraamai yel
Kadaivdhu uyriyathaan endru
Adhu edho adhu edho ennai vaattuthe

Pandri kaichal mathiri,
paruva kaaichal thaanadi
Udhadu udhadu odambu mothamum ketkum

paduka kuthuthu raathiri,
Purandu kathuthu poongili
Nilavu suttathum narambil pattathu theepori

Othungi ninnathu kaalathaan
Urasi vandhathu karava thaan
Manasum kettathu mayangi vittathu -emma emma
enna summa summa ninna thaaakuva

Criket enbathu fixingthaan,
Kaadhal Enbathu mixingthaan -ingu
bet mela bet katti dhinam aadalam

Pandha kandathum catch-u thaan
Pidichi jeipa match-u thaan
Vidiya mattilum veluthi kattuva batting

Ennaku vachathu pitch-u thaan
unnaku vaikanum ichu thaan
Ilamaiku verum 20  over-u podhuma

Adichu aadura dhoni thaan
edhuthu aengra meni thaan
viragam enbathum naragam enbathum onnu onnu
Chinna ponnu ponnu onna kooduthe

Onna ononnah, naan sonna summa sonna
athu seivadhu un duti-yadi
Ai emma emmemmma, summa nee summa
UN istam pola lootiyadi..

Noolaadai nikaatha idupu oh o oh
Nee vandhu soraakum aduppu oh o oh
Enna thodamale summa soodethura
naana naana vandhu modhuren .....

Mankatha Song Lyrics
